title: Problem-Based Learning (PBL) Program for Designing Sustainable Development Education Policies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A course that balances ecosystem and human-centered paradigms through VR-based simulations, strengthening the ability to design sustainable development policies through real-world case studies

learning_goals: Learners will be able to analyze the interaction between ecosystems and human-centered approaches to propose a balanced model for sustainable development policies.
Learners will be able to design and simulate community-based sustainable development scenarios in a VR environment through Problem-Based Learning (PBL).
Learners will be able to quantitatively evaluate the effectiveness of eco-health linkage policies using mathematical data analysis.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
